section.section: All provisions of the guidance manual that are not specifically noted as standards or minimum requirements shall be deemed recommendations by the Department for the development of the local program.

text.section:
By December 31, 1992, the Department shall prepare and provide to local authorities a statewide forest resource inventory that shall:
Be updated every 5 years or as deemed appropriate by the Department; and
Include a list of potential sites for reforestation or afforestation of both publicly and privately owned land on a county by county basis.
